msg: Add InstanceManager to Context interface. This is required by the Servlet 3.1 based upgrade mechanism.

msg: Rename ActionCode.UPGRADE to ActionCode.UPGRADE_TOMCAT to mark this as the Tomcat proprietary upgrade mechanism.

author: markt
msg: Old and new upgrade mechanisms have a isUpgrade() method on the processor and they need to be differentiated. Calls to the old version can easily be replaced so do so.
